thread.title: It's tough to be like Cristiano Ronaldo, says his body double Diego Davila
thread.title_full: It's tough to be like Cristiano Ronaldo, says his body double Diego Davila - Sports

author: A Correspondent
title: It's tough to be like Cristiano Ronaldo, says his body double Diego Davila
text:
Ronaldo's body double Diego Davila 
Portuguese football star Cristiano Ronaldo's body double, Diego Davila has admitted that he finds it difficult to maintain the look and body shape of the Real Madrid star.
Real Madrid star Cristiano Ronaldo posted this picture on Instagram yesterday with his Rs 14 crore Bugatti Veyron, the worldâ€™s fastest car 
"I have to take care of my body a lot. He's a world-class athlete and has incredible physical qualities. I have to have my body as similar as possible to his all the time, although there are obvious differences due to genetics. I always need to have my hair exactly the same as his so I get a haircut from his personal hairstylist, Miguel," Davila was quoted as saying by The Sun.
